summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 between law enforcement officials and an aviation records specialist. It contains detailed aircraft registration and ownership information for helicopters and jets associated with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, including tail numbers N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2) and N331JE, and identifies key individuals involved in the aircraft transactions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as a private pilot who personally piloted a helicopter (Air Ghislaine 2) and was a frequent passenger on jets associated with Jeffrey Epstein. Her pilot certificate issue dates and associated aircraft are listed.

persons.name: Lawrence P. Visoski, Jr.
persons.context: Signed the current registration documents for helicopter N722JE on 17 July 2019 and for N331JE on 19 November 2019 on behalf of the registered owner, Hyperion Air LLC.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.role: Signatory on Aircraft Registration / Corporate Representative
persons.context: Signed aircraft registration documents for Freedom Air International, Inc. on 02 August 2010 and was the seller's signatory for Hyperion Air, Inc. on 12 August 2013 for helicopter N331JE.

persons.name: James D. Clark
persons.context: Signed as the seller for ASI Wings LLC when it sold helicopter N722JE on 13 June 2019.

persons.name: William P. Merriam Jr
persons.context: Signed as the seller for Bovale Developments, Inc. when it sold an aircraft (later registered as N331JE) on 06 March 2012.

persons.name: Van Heurck
persons.context: Mentioned as a surname that may be relevant to the case, potentially as a pilot of one of the aircraft. The email asks if this name has any relevance.

connections.description: Visoski signed the registration documents for helicopters (N722JE, N331JE) owned by Hyperion Air LLC, which are associated with Maxwell's travel and piloting.
Indyke was involved in corporate aircraft transactions and registrations for entities (Freedom Air International, Inc., Hyperion Air, Inc.) linked to aircraft Maxwell used.

events.title: Maxwell's Pilot Certificate Issued
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's private pilot certificate was issued.

events.title: Purchase of Sikorsky S-76C
events.description: Aircraft later known as N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2) was purchased from Sikorsky.

events.title: N722JE Registration Issued to Hyperion Air
events.description: Current registration for helicopter N722JE (Air Ghislaine 2) was issued to Hyperion Air LLC, signed by Lawrence Visoski.

events.title: N331JE Registration Issued to Hyperion Air
events.description: Current registration for helicopter N331JE was issued to Hyperion Air, LLC, signed by Lawrence Visoski.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was a certified private pilot for rotorcraft and personally piloted a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter nicknamed 'Air Ghislaine 2' (tail number N722JE).
Multiple aircraft (helicopters N722JE, N331JE, N491GM and jets N2121E, N1201E, N9091E, N9081E) are documented as being associated with Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein's travel.
The corporate entity Hyperion Air LLC is identified as the current registered owner of helicopters N722JE and N331JE as of 2019-2020.
The document reveals a chain of aircraft ownership and name changes (e.g., from Air Ghislaine Inc. to Shmitka Air Inc. in 2010) for the assets.
The correspondence is part of a law enforcement investigation seeking aircraft records, with a request for discretion due to the high-profile nature of the case.
